name: Wishpicker
overview:
Need help deciding what to gift? Wishpicker.com is your ultimate source of gift ideas.

Find 1000s of gifts hand-picked from the best online stores, customized by occasion and personality of the recipient.

Wishpicker.com was founded by a bunch of IIT graduates to remove the pain out of the gifting experience. Deciding what to gift when that occasion is around the corner has always been a problem - but no more! With Wishpicker, you can be guaranteed to find the perfect gift ideas for your loved ones, creating memories that you will forever cherish.

Our complex algorithm enables you to find the perfect gift based on the occasion, relationship with the recipient, and a bunch of other parameters that make sure that your gift is perfect for the occasion. Browse through thousands of gifts (gift vouchers, experiences, cakes, flowers, personalised gifts, books, apparel, electronics, home & kitchen items, beauty products, bags, belts, watches, fragrances, office & stationary, jewellery and lots more!) handpicked from the most trusted online stores. With Wishpicker, you can never get a gift wrong!
